exceptions.exn: In environment orig_base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params x, y : entry l : list entry i : nat H1 : eIndex x = S (eIndex y) H2 : contiguous_range_exact_lo (y :: l) i e' : entry H3 : In e' (x :: y :: l) Unable to unify "?M1663 = ?M1663 \\/ (fix In (a : ?M1662) (l : list ?M1662) {struct l} : Prop := match l with | [] => False | b :: m => b = a \\/ In a m end) ?M1663 ?M1664" with "S i <= eIndex e'".

original: intros x y l i H1 H2. unfold contiguous_range_exact_lo. split. - intros i' H3. apply H2 in H3 as [e [H4 H5]]. exists e. split. + simpl. omega. + apply in_cons. apply H5. - intros e' H3. apply H2 in H3. apply in_eq.
